name: WARtermelon
description:
WARtermelon!

Plant watermelon patches for your Catermelon people to live, but beware of the hungry ratberry creatures!

HOW TO PLAY

Move: WASD or arrow keys

Shoot arrow: Space key

Plant watermelon patch: Hold shift (1 second on empty patch)

Build tower: Hold shift (1 second on watermelon patch)
